name: Wrestle Funny - 2018 wrestle games free funny
name_original: Wrestle Funny - 2018 wrestle games free funny
description:
This is an amazing and funny game, you will win once you could make your opponent's head hit the ground, or you will lose.These all rule in the game~

You could drive your legs by taping the button on the screen. The funny point of the game is that people could rollover in the air hand in hand, and try to catch the chance to make your opponent bump into the obstacle.
What are you waiting for? Come and join this funny game quickly!
